text: "God Is a Woman" (written in sentence case) is a song by American singer Ariana Grande, from her fourth studio album, Sweetener (2018). The song was released on July 13, 2018, as the second single from the album, after "No Tears Left to Cry". The song discusses the theme of God as a female. American singer Madonna is featured as the voice of God in the music video for the song. The song reached the top five of the charts in the UK, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, and Australia and reached the top ten in the US. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2018) Peak position Argentina (Argentina Hot 100) 63 Bolivia (Monitor Latino) 13 Croatia (HRT) 44 Denmark (Tracklisten) 17 France (SNEP) 38 Greece Digital Songs (Billboard) 1 Iceland (Tonlist) 1 Ireland (IRMA) 4 Italy (FIMI) 27 Israel (Media Forest) 1 Lebanon (Lebanese Top 20) 14 Malaysia (RIM) 4 Netherlands (Mega Top 50) 22 New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) 5 Norway (VG-lista) 13 Romania (Airplay 100) 92 Singapore (RIAS) 4 Spain (PROMUSICAE) 35 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 12 ===Monthly charts=== Chart (2018) Peak position Brazil Streaming (Pro-MÃºsica) 37 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2018) Position Australia (ARIA) 91 Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 66 Hungary (Single Top 40) 84 Hungary (Stream Top 40) 56 Israel (Galgalatz) 17 Portugal (AFP) 83 UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 76 US Billboard Hot 100 62 US Dance Club Songs (Billboard) 40 US Mainstream Top 40 (Billboard) 27 Chart (2019) Position Portugal (AFP) 263 == References == Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:2018 songs Category:Trap songs Category:Pop songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:R&B; songs
title: God Is a Woman
